detectors.description: TheRichies.random(uint256,uint256,uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x883cddda275facb7c9932ee4e0f410e1ccdb19c1-TheRichies.sol#701-721) uses a weak PRNG: seed.mod(to - from) + from (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x883cddda275facb7c9932ee4e0f410e1ccdb19c1-TheRichies.sol#720)

TheRichies.random(uint256,uint256,uint256) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x883cddda275facb7c9932ee4e0f410e1ccdb19c1-TheRichies.sol#701-721) uses a weak PRNG due to hashing tx inputs: seed = uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.timestamp + block.difficulty + ((uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(block.coinbase)))) / (block.timestamp)) + block.gaslimit + ((uint256(keccak256(bytes)(abi.encodePacked(msg.sender)))) / (block.timestamp)) + block.number + salty))) (crytic-export/etherscan-contracts/0x883cddda275facb7c9932ee4e0f410e1ccdb19c1-TheRichies.sol#706-719)
